A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have seen most Star Wars film multiple times\, but I don't think I'll bother again with this one.  The plot has MASSIVE holes in it (no spoiler comments here)\, some of the characters are really poorly developed / unnecessary\, scenes (as another reviewer noted) are not needed / confuse things\, and no\, gravity doesn't happen in space\, which negates a crucial 10 minutes of the film (so\, a little bit of spoiling here).  My family and I - wife and 2 sons - all walked out with \"meh\" as our review\, and each from different perspectives.  If we add up all our \"mehs\"\, we probably would give it 2 stars\, except that it's Star Wars\, and the CGI is outrageously incredible.  The effects get 5 stars\, the plot\, character development\, and unnecessary / ridiculous scenes get 2 stars.   I can't recommend it to anyone other than Star Wars fans.
